import React from 'react' import Header from '../header/header'; import styles from './SetupLanguage.module.css'; import {Link} from 'react-router-dom'; import { useState } from "react"; import { createApiEndpoint, ENDPOINTS } from "../../api"; export default function SetupLanguage() { //const {switchToSignin } = useContext(AccountContext); const [sourceLanguage, setSourceLanguage] = useState(''); const [targetLanguage, setTargetLanguage] = useState(''); const [sName, setsName] = useState(''); const [tname, settName] = useState(''); const data = {SourceLanguage:sourceLanguage, TargetLanguage:targetLanguage, SourceLanguageName:sName, TargetLanguageName:tName}; const myLanguagePage = () => {createApiEndpoint(ENDPOINTS.PROJECT).create(data). then(res => { console.log(res); }). catch(err => console.log(err) )} return (

Setup Languages


Default locale Set the default locale for this project.


setsName(t.target.value)} className= {styles.form1} type="text" placeholder='Enter Name'/>


Languages Set the languages you want to translate to


settName(t.target.value)} className= {styles.form1} type="text" placeholder='Enter Name'/>
) }
